data.title: Assam Land Bank
data.meta_description: Assam Land Bank - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. This document provides information about the state of Assam in India. It notes that Assam is located in northeast India and shares international borders with Bhutan and Bangladesh. It has a population of over 6.4 million households and is strategically located to act as a gateway to northeast India and Southeast Asia due to proposed transportation infrastructure. The document highlights Assam's access to large domestic and international markets as well as its existing transportation connectivity through various modes of transport.
